title: Redesign of Social Sector Online Programs Based on Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories in social sciences and practical experience
context.additional_context: Social sector competency enhancement program for current practitioners, offering project-based assessments and digital device-integrated learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply a structured framework to analyze social issues in mobile environments with over 80% accuracy.
Learners complete a digital collaboration project that solves real-world problems using peer feedback and collaborative learning tools.
Learners can propose and evaluate at least three social conflict resolution strategies through situational simulation activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
